channel.title: git on Zonggen's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in git on Zonggen's Blog

item.title: Note on #Git
item.description: Note on git: Pretty print the contents of the commit logs in a given format: git show --format=fuller git commit --amend --author "Allen Bai <abai@redhat.com>" Test a PR locally: git fetch <remote> pull/<id>/head (check this out) Other notes: git show --format=fuller FETCH_HEAD git checkout <previous commit_id> <file_name> git show --stat HEAD
